name: Mew Mew Mirror (Discovered Darkness, wilcoxnl17, GarinT, BelleBunny, Anthony Iozzo, Hexnite)
name_original: Mew Mew Mirror (Discovered Darkness, wilcoxnl17, GarinT, BelleBunny, Anthony Iozzo, Hexnite)
description:
Mew Mew Mirror is a Side Scroller Puzzle Platformer game where you play as a pair of magic-wielding anthropomorphic cats. 

Cali and Tab are trapped on opposite sides of a mirror, a dark side and a light side (day/night). You must solve puzzles, defeat enemies and collect the broken shards of the magic mirror to reunite the cats together and finally defeat the boss.
